existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the issue causing the entire page content to fail to load. Investigate React rendering errors, query failures, component mounting issues, or authentication/actor initialization problems that may be preventing the page from displaying.

Update the Footer component's background animation to match the hero section's animation style. Apply the same particle/motion/vector effects system used in HeroMultiEffectsLayer to the footer background, respecting the current hero theme settings (particle effects, motion effects, vector effects) stored in the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update footer background animation to match hero section

projectName: Fix page loading failure and update footer animation
